course_description: This course surveys intellectual traditions of leadership and engages students in the form of leadership that is public scholarship. In addition to introducing students to forms and questions of leadership through readings in literature, philosophy, and history, the course will also introduce students to influential leaders who have a special relationship with Emory and the ILA.
